Ruby 3.3 Released with Major Performance Improvements

By Tech Reporter

January 20, 2024

The Ruby core team has announced the release of Ruby 3.3 with significant performance enhancements.

Ruby 3.3 brings major performance improvements to the language, including faster garbage collection and improved JIT compilation.

Rails 7.1 Introduces New Features

By Jane Developer

January 18, 2024

Ruby on Rails 7.1 has been released with exciting new features for developers.

The latest version of Rails introduces several new features including improved security, better performance, and new developer tools.
